text: as we reached the shrine who were
confronted by scarcely believable scenes
many of them too horrific for us to show
paramedics had arrived within minutes
they were overwhelmed by the injuries
this was a powerful and brutally
well-placed bomb at a site which is
always crowded there are scenes of the
most appalling carnage here right in the
center of Bangkok's most popular
shopping district this is a temple next
to a five-star hotel very very popular
with tourists coming to wish for good
fortune we heard the most enormous bang
here a few minutes ago saw these
motorbikes over there they were ablaze
they've just put the fire out there are
bodies all over the place people with
terrible injuries that was a very
powerful blast at the moment we don't
know what caused it whether it was a
bomb or something else but we haven't
seen these kinds of scenes before in
this part of Bangkok very very shocking
terrible injuries just the most
appalling distraction this was the
moment the device exploded caught on a
CCTV camera
the blast scattering commuters and
tourists
there have been occasional bombs before
in this city but nothing on this scale
for Thailand this is a profoundly
shocking incident the police examined
the surprisingly small crater it left
beside the now buckled fence surrounding
the shrine trying to work out who would
carry out such an attack and why
